summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the West Galer Street Grade Crossing Project; authorizing the execution of the First Addendum to the Transportation Access Improvement Interlocal Cooperation Agreement relating to that Project and authorized by Ordinance 118801; authorizing the acceptance and execution of a Performance Guarantee relating to that Project; authorizing certain amendments to the First Addendum and to the Performance Guarantee; authorizing the acceptance and execution of extensions of time for certain performance pursuant to the Performance Guarantee; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and amending Ordinances 118528 and 119084.
